docs.snippet: Turkey, Switzerland and France have pulled out of the race to host matches at Euro 2020, which will be held in 13 venues around the continent, their soccer federations said on Friday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Turkey, Switzerland and France have pulled out of the race to host matches at Euro 2020, which will be held in 13 venues around the continent, their soccer federations said on Friday.

headline.main: Turkey, Switzerland, France End Euro 2020 Bids

docs.snippet: Michigan State let its players choose sides for the annual spring football game, like a group of kids meeting up on the playground. Arkansas State auctioned off one of its coaching spots on eBay, allowing a fan to come in and call plays....
docs.lead_paragraph: Michigan State let its players choose sides for the annual spring football game, like a group of kids meeting up on the playground. Arkansas State auctioned off one of its coaching spots on eBay, allowing a fan to come in and call plays.

headline.main: No Clear Consensus on Best Spring Game Format

docs.snippet: Former champions VfB Stuttgart edged closer to safety with a nervy 0-0 draw at Hanover 96 on Friday that gave them a six-point buffer from the drop zone and all but secured Bundesliga football for their opponents....
docs.lead_paragraph: Former champions VfB Stuttgart edged closer to safety with a nervy 0-0 draw at Hanover 96 on Friday that gave them a six-point buffer from the drop zone and all but secured Bundesliga football for their opponents.

headline.main: Stuttgart and Hanover Edge Closer to Bundesliga Safety
headline.print_headline: Stuttgart and Hanover Edge Closer to Bundesliga Safety

docs.snippet: Over-the-top food spreads have become another way for universities to compete in the ongoing college sports arms race....
docs.lead_paragraph: Over-the-top food spreads have become another way for universities to compete in the ongoing college sports arms race.
docs.abstract: NCAA Division I board of directors votes to allow universities to offer unlimited meals and snacks to athletes in addition to the meal plans provided as part of athletes’ scholarships; under the old rules, universities were allowed to provide only three meals per day or a food stipend.

headline.main: N.C.A.A. Ensures Athletes Will Get All They Can Eat
headline.print_headline: N.C.A.A. Ensures Athletes Will Get All They Can Eat

docs.snippet: In a historic vote, Northwestern University football players cast secret ballots Friday on whether to form the nation's first union for college athletes — a decision that could change the landscape of American amateur sports....
docs.lead_paragraph: In a historic vote, Northwestern University football players cast secret ballots Friday on whether to form the nation's first union for college athletes — a decision that could change the landscape of American amateur sports.

headline.main: Historic Day as Northwestern Players Decide Union
headline.print_headline: Historic Day as Northwestern Players Decide Union

docs.snippet: Bookmaker William Hill Plc will close more than 100 British betting shops this year, blaming the decision on a tax increase on high-stakes gambling machines that have become one of their main sources of revenue....
